room_title: Escape room "The Recipe" by Trapped Downtown in Hastings
room_address: 229 N. St Joseph Ave Hastings, NE 68901
room_description:
Hastings, Nebraska was put on the map in the 1920's when a particular recipe was discovered that would completely revolutionize the beverage industry. Lost somewhere in recorded history is the fact that 'The Recipe' was actually stolen from its original inventor... you!
You had planned on opening a factory in Hastings with your business partner but he turned his back on you, stole your idea, and is planning to catch the next train to Chicago! Will you be able to retrieve 'The Recipe' and help re-write history for Hastings?
